title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8130.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8130.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 49
between Route 291 and Route 12 in the City of Utica and the Town of

Marcy. (b) Route 291 between Route
69 and Route 49 in the Towns of Marcy and Whitestown. (c) Route 233 between Routes 49 and 365 and

Sutliff Road, CR 90, in the City of Rome and the Towns of Rome and

Whitestown. (d) Route 365 between

Thruway Exit 33 and Route 5 in the Village of Oneida Castle and the Towns of

Verona and Vernon. (e) Route 5. Route 5 between the Madison-Oneida county line and Route 31 in the City of

Sherrill, Villages of Oneida Castle and Vernon and Town of Vernon. (f) Route 5. Route 5 between Route 233 and
the Herkimer-Oneida county line, in the City of Utica and the Towns of

Westmoreland, Kirkland and New Hartford. (g) Route 5A between Route 5 and IR 790 in
the City of Utica and the Villages of New York Mills and Yorkville and the

Towns of New Hartford and Whitestown. (h) Route 12 between Putnam Road and the

Lewis-Oneida county line in the Villages of Boonville and Remsen and the Towns
of Trenton, Remsen, Steuben and Boonville. (i) Route 13. Route 13 between the

Oneida-Madison county line and the Oneida-Oswego county line (Camden village
line) in the Villages of Camden and Sylvan Beach and the Towns of Florence, Verona, Vienna and Camden. (j) Route 12 between Tibbitts Road (CR 15) and Route 8 in the City of Utica and the

Town of New Hartford. (k) Campion

Road between Route 12 and Genesee Street in the Village of New Hartford and the

Town of New Hartford. (l) Route 31
between Route 365 and Route 5 in the Towns of Verona and Vernon and the Village
of Vernon. (m) -(n)
[Reserved]
(o) CR 19 between Route
233 and CR 32 in the Towns of Westmoreland and Kirkland. (p) [Eff. until Dec. 12, 1989, see also subd. (p) below.] Route 8. Route 8 between Main Street (CR 9) and Route 20 in the

Villages of Clayville and Bridgewater and the Towns of Paris and

Bridgewater. (p) [Eff. Dec. 12, 1989, see also subd. (p) above.] Route 8. Route 8 between Main Street (CR 9)
and the Madison-Oneida county line in the Villages of Clayville and Bridgewater
and the Towns of Paris and Bridgewater. (q) [Eff. until Jan. 17, 1999, see also subd. (q) below.] Route 20. Route 20 between Route 12 and Route 8 in the Village of

Bridgewater and the Towns of Sangerfield and Bridgewater. (q) [Eff. Jan. 17, 1999, see also subd. (q)
above.] Route 20. Route 20 between the Madison-Oneida county line and the

Otsego-Oneida county line in the Village of Bridgewater and the Towns of

Sangerfield and Bridgewater. (r) Route 69. Route 69 between Route 5A and Route 291, in the Villages of Yorkville
and Whitesboro and the Town of Whitestown. (s) Route 69. Route 69 between the

Oneida-Oswego county line and Route 365 in the City of Rome, Village of Camden
and the Towns of Camden, Annsville and Lee. (t) Route 46. Route 46 between Route 69 and

Route 12D in the City of Rome, Village of Boonville and the Towns of Boonville
and Western. (u) Route 26. Route 26
between Route 46 and Oneida-Lewis county line in the City of Rome and the Towns
of Ava and Lee. (v) Route 12D. Route 12D between Route 12 and the Oneida-Lewis county line in the Village of

Boonville and the Town of Boonville. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8130.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
